text: Hesperia ottoe, the Ottoe skipper, is a butterfly of the family Hesperiidae. It is found in the central U.S. but has been recorded in Canada only in a small area of southern Manitoba.Ottoe Skipper, Butterflies of Canada The wingspan is 29–35 mm. The flight period is from mid-June to early August. The larvae feed on Poaceae species, Leptoloma cognatum, little bluestem (Andropogon scoparius), and, in Minnesota, on the flowers of purple coneflower (Echinacea angustifolia).Hesperia, funet.fi ==References== ==External links== *Ottoe Skipper, Butterflies and Moths of North America Category:Hesperia (butterfly) Category:Butterflies described in 1866 Category:Butterflies of North America
